allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Complete data migration tool with resume parsing

Features:
- Resume upload with PDF/DOC support (10MB max)
- Interactive text selection and auto-fill from resume
- Comprehensive profile builder with 5 sections:
  * Basic Information with email validation
  * Work Experience with "I currently work here" checkbox
  * Projects with in-progress/finished status
  * Education with degree and institution tracking
  * Skills with tag-based interface
  
- Card management: duplicate, clear, reorder (up/down arrows)
- Progress tracking with milestone celebrations
- Encouraging messages and time estimates
- Floating panel mode for better workflow
- Context menu for quick field mapping
- Auto-save functionality with visual feedback
- Completion review screen with validation
- Responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- TypeScript for type safety
- Supabase integration ready

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
